

−4R1
+2R1
−R1
When we now apply the indicated transformations (e.g., subtract Row 1
four times from Row 2), we obtain


1 −2 1 −1 1 0
0 0 −1 1 −3 2
0 0 0 −3 6 −3
0 0 −1 −2 3 a


−R2 −R3
⇝


1 −2 1 −1 1 0
0 0 −1 1 −3 2
0 0 0 −3 6 −3
0 0 0 0 0 a+1


·(−1)
·(−1
3 )
⇝


1 −2 1 −1 1 0
0 0 1 −1 3 −2
0 0 0 1 −2 1
0 0 0 0 0 a+1

